title: Embroidery (Egypt), 10th–12th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: plain weave, interlacing stitch
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 22.9 x 37.1 cm (9 x 14 5/8 in.)
description: Tan linen embroidered with two shades of blue silk. Rectangular panel with S-shaped border design. Central motif is almost entirely gone. Rosette in each corner with light blue center. Pointed tabs added to each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery (Egypt), 10th–12th century. Medium: linen, silk
Technique: plain weave, interlacing stitch. 
1939-11-15.
